reviewText:
The company making this film doesn't have a clue as to the difference between dive-bombers, torpedo planes, fighters or 4 engine bombers. Ignorance of the subject is appalling. I served on dive bombers in WW II. Signed: Charles G. Westwater
  For a good introduction to the subject of dive-bombing read Eric M. Bergerads book: "Fire in the Sky" concerning the air war in the South Pacific 1942 - 1943.
